mapper.insert: insert into board(title, content, author, boardPass, attachedFile) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{author}, #{boardPass}, #{attachedFile})
insert into file(boardId, originalFilename, storedFilename) values(#{boardId}, #{originalFilename}, #{storedFilename})
mapper.select:
select count(id) from board
and title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
